channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.description: 获取表下一个id： 获取id函数 call pNextID('tablename',v_NextID) - 之后select v_NextID+(row_number() over())-1 就可以按照需要插入的数据量相加来当做id 之后更新下tSequence表 UPDATE tSequence SET ID=(SELECT nvl(max(ID),1) FROM HRM_EmpQuery) WHERE NAME ='HRM_EmpQuery'; DELETE TSEQUENCE WHERE NAME='HRM_EmpInfoSet'; INSERT INTO TSEQUENCE(NAME,id) SELECT 'HRM_EmpInfoSet',max(id) FROM HRM_EmpInfoSet; 水水水水水
